Attacks.Name: Infernal Parade
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition and suffers 1 additional damage at the start of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Shadow Ball
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, reduce the target character's Defense by 1 until the end of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Hex
Attacks.Effect: If the target character has a special condition, add 2 dice to the attack roll. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Frisk
Superpowers.Effect: When this character makes an attack, if a wild is rolled, this character gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Flame Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: This character gains immunity to the Burn special condition. Additionally, enemy characters that make melee attacks against this character gain the Burn special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Phantom Flames
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range and line of sight. That character suffers 2 damage and gains both the Burn and Stun special conditions. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Infernal Parade
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character. All affected characters gain the Burn special condition. If a wild is rolled, affected characters also gain the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Cursed Flames
Superpowers.Effect: All enemy characters within range and line of sight suffer 2 damage and gain the Burn special condition. Additionally, they lose 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Frisk
Superpowers.Effect: When this character makes an attack, if a wild is rolled, this character gains 1 power.
